resources.string: This app is an [Open Source](https://github.com/fokkezb) work in progress by [Appcelerator](http://www.appcelerator.com) Developer Evangelist [Fokke Zandbergen](http://fokkezb.nl). He plans to [cycle 400km](http://fokkezb.nl/rwanda) through Rwanda in June 2016 and raise â‚¬10.000 for the work of [Compassion](http://www.compassion.com/): "Releasing children from poverty in Jesus' name".
